news.title: 德国总理警告：基于规则的世界秩序已不复存在
news.title0: World's rules-based order 'no longer exists', Germany's Merz warns
news.content: 德国总理在慕尼黑安全会议上警告，基于规则的世界秩序已不复存在，呼吁欧洲为“牺牲”做好准备。
news.content0: The rules-based world order "no longer exists", the German Chancellor has warned at a major security summit.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美移民官员被指就枪击案作伪证
news.title0: ICE agents may have lied about shooting of migrant in Minneapolis, officials say
news.content: 美国移民与海关执法局称，两名官员在关于明尼阿波利斯移民枪击案的宣誓证词中可能做了“不实陈述”。
news.content0: Two immigration agents may have made "untruthful statements" in sworn testimony about the shooting of a migrant in Minneapolis last month, Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) has said.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 迪拜港口巨头负责人因爱泼斯坦关联辞职
news.title0: Head of Dubai-based ports giant quits after Epstein links revealed
news.content: 全球港口运营商DP World的负责人因与性犯罪者爱泼斯坦的关联曝光而面临压力，已辞去董事长兼首席执行官职务。
news.content0: The head of global ports operator DP World has left the company after mounting pressure over his links to convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 特朗普撤销关键气候政策，影响深远
news.title0: Six possible effects of Trump's climate policy change
news.content: 特朗普总统撤销了奥巴马时代认定温室气体危害公共健康的关键裁决，此举可能增加排放并影响美国汽车业。
news.content0: US President Donald Trump has announced the reversal of the so-called endangerment finding, a key Obama-era scientific ruling that underpins much of US environmental legislation.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美海军陆战队员成缉毒行动首位阵亡者
news.title0: Troop who fell overboard becomes first American killed in drug boat targeting operation
news.content: 一名美国海军陆战队员在加勒比海从攻击舰上落水身亡，成为特朗普政府打击贩毒船行动中首位已知的美军阵亡者。
news.content0: A US Marine who fell overboard from an attack ship in the Caribbean has become the first known American casualty in the Trump administration's operation targeting drug-trafficking boats.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 研究：特朗普关税成本主要由美国企业和消费者承担
news.title0: Costs from Trump's tariffs paid mainly by US firms and consumers, NY Fed says
news.content: 纽约联储研究发现，2025年增加的关税成本中，90%由美国公司和消费者承担，导致进口商品价格上涨。
news.content0: As President Donald Trump changed tariff agreements with a number of countries, there was one constant: goods became more expensive for US companies and consumers.
news.author: BBC

news.title: FBI公布女主播母亲绑架案嫌犯特征
news.title0: FBI releases description of suspect in Nancy Guthrie kidnapping
news.content: FBI公布了涉嫌绑架美国新闻主播萨凡纳·格思里母亲的男子体貌特征，并悬赏10万美元征集线索。
news.content0: The FBI has released the first physical description of the man believed to have kidnapped Nancy Guthrie, the mother of US news anchor Savannah Guthrie.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 亚马逊旗下Ring因隐私担忧终止与Flock合作
news.title0: Amazon’s Ring cancels controversial partnership with tech company Flock amid privacy concerns
news.content: 亚马逊旗下智能门铃公司Ring因隐私担忧，终止了与车牌识别技术公司Flock Safety的合作关系。
news.content0: Ring, the Amazon-owned video doorbell company, has canceled its partnership with technology firm Flock Safety, the company said Thursday.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 国际奥委会因出售纳粹奥运T恤遭批评
news.title0: IOC under fire for selling Nazi-era Olympic Games T-shirt
news.content: 国际奥委会因在其官方商店出售纪念1936年纳粹德国柏林奥运会的T恤而受到广泛批评。
news.content0: TheInternational Olympic Committee(IOC) has been criticized for selling merchandise commemorating the 1936 Berlin games, whichAdolf Hitlerused to showcase his Nazi ideology.
news.author: CNN
